text: J. Nicholas Mandziuk (December 13, 1902 - September 7, 1969) was a Canadian politician in Manitoba. He represented the electoral district of Marquette in the House of Commons of Canada from 1957 to 1968. He was a member of the Progressive Conservative Party. ==External links== * Category:1902 births Category:1969 deaths Category:Members of the House of Commons of Canada from Manitoba Category:Progressive Conservative Party of Canada MPs Category:Ukrainian emigrants to Canada
title: Nick Mandziuk
